data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Engel, Michael S., Michener, Charles D. (2012): The melectine bee genera Brachymelecta and Sinomelecta (Hymenoptera, Apidae). ZooKeys 244: 1-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.244.3979, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.244.3979
